column5: Hello As far i know in east we can fish for steelhead from cn bridge to lake.How about in north.i am planning toward Barrie and there is some goods spots i saw in map.so what is the regulation there.can u fish for steelhead there.let me know.thx

Notty is open from the mouth of the Boyne R. to the mouth, excluding all tribs. They will be open on the 26 of April. Also, catch and release only between mouth of the Boyne to the Pine. It's best to read the reg's before you go anywhere, as open seasons vary form trib to trib.
